Content: Former President Mahinda Rajapaksa says that their group decided not to participate in the 66th Anniversary celebrations of the SLFP. He expressed these views to the media following an event in Colombo yesterday (01). The 66 th anniversary celebrations will be held under the patronage of President Maithripala Sirisena at 1.30pm at the Campbell Park, tomorrow (03). Earlier, UPFA Secretary General Mahinda Amaraweera said all JO members and former President Mahinda Rajapaksa was sent invitations to attend the event.
